packagefinder 0.3.3
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Searching for packages on CRAN

Source: R/packagefinder.r
fp.Rd

Shorter alias for function findPackage().

fp(...)

Arguments

...

Arguments as in findPackage().

Author

Joachim Zuckarelli joachim@zuckarelli.de

Examples

# \donttest{
fp(c("meta", "regression"))

#> Your are searching packages for the terms 'meta', 'regression' in or mode (at least one occurence of any of the search terms)
#> 
#> Please wait while index is being searched...
#> 
#> Results: 2150 out of 17409 CRAN packages found in 16 seconds. Top 15 results are shown. Use parameter 'limit.results' to increase number of results shown. 
# }
